edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.dao.domain

Class InventoryItemDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.dao.domain.InventoryItemDao

  • public class InventoryItemDao
extends java.lang.Object
    A Data Access Object for InventoryItem entities

    Uses JsonDao to persist InventoryItem entities in JSON format

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InventoryItemDao()
      Default constructor creates a JSON file called inventory.json

      Allows for a GenericDao of the correct type to be specified
      InventoryItemDao(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructor allowing the JSON filename to be specified
